original: Majjhima Nikāya 8
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Sallekhasutta
analyzed: sallekha sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Atha kho āyasmā mahācundo sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai mahācundo sāyanha samayam paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami

original: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmā

original: mahācundo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: mahācundaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “yā imā, bhante, anekavihitā diṭṭhiyo loke uppajjanti—
analyzed: yāḥ imāḥ bhante aneka vihitāḥ diṭṭhiyaḥ loke uppajjanti

original: attavādapaṭisaṁyuttā vā lokavādapaṭisaṁyuttā vā—
analyzed: attavāda paṭisayuttāḥ vā lokavāda paṭisayuttāḥ vā

original: ādimeva nu kho, bhante, bhikkhuno manasikaroto evametāsaṁ diṭṭhīnaṁ pahānaṁ hoti, evametāsaṁ diṭṭhīnaṁ paṭinissaggo hotī”ti?
analyzed: ādim eva nu kho bhante bhikkhuno manasikarotaḥ evam etāsam diṭṭhīnam pahānam hoti evam etāsam diṭṭhīnam paṭinissaggaḥ hoti iti

original: “Yā imā, cunda, anekavihitā diṭṭhiyo loke uppajjanti—
analyzed: yāḥ imāḥ cunda aneka vihitāḥ diṭṭhiyaḥ loke uppajjanti

original: attavādapaṭisaṁyuttā vā lokavādapaṭisaṁyuttā vā—
analyzed: attavāda paṭisayuttāḥ vā lokavāda paṭisayuttāḥ vā

original: yattha cetā diṭṭhiyo uppajjanti yattha ca anusenti yattha ca samudācaranti taṁ ‘netaṁ
analyzed: yattha ca itā diṭṭhiyaḥ uppajjanti yattha ca anusenti yattha ca samudācaranti tam na ita

original: mama, nesohamasmi, na me so attā’ti—evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññā passato evametāsaṁ
analyzed: mama na iso ham asmi na me so attā ati evam etam yathābhūtam sammappaññā passato evam etāsa

original: diṭṭhīnaṁ pahānaṁ hoti, evametāsaṁ diṭṭhīnaṁ paṭinissaggo hoti.
analyzed: diṭṭhīnam pahānam hoti evam etāsam diṭṭhīnam paṭinissaggaḥ hoti

original: Ṭhānaṁ kho panetaṁ, cunda, vijjati yaṁ idhekacco bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca
analyzed: ṭhānam kho pana ita cunda vijjati yam idha ekaccaḥ bhikkhu vivicca iva kāmehi vivicca

original: akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja vihareyya.
analyzed: akusalehi dhammehi sa vitakkam sa vicāram viveka jam pīti sukham paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja vihareyya

analyzed: tassa evamassa

original: ‘sallekhena viharāmī’ti.
analyzed: sallekhena viharāmi iti

original: 1. Sallekhapariyāya
analyzed: sallekha pariyāya

original: Idha kho pana vo, cunda, sallekho karaṇīyo.
analyzed: idha kho pana vaḥ cunda sallekhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: ‘Pare vihiṁsakā bhavissanti, mayamettha avihiṁsakā bhavissāmā’ti sallekho karaṇīyo.
analyzed: pare vihisakāḥ bhavissanti mayam ettha a vihisakāḥ bhavissāma ati sallekhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: ‘Pare pāṇātipātī bhavissanti, mayamettha pāṇātipātā paṭiviratā bhavissāmā’ti sallekho karaṇīyo.
analyzed: pare pāṇa atipātī bhavissanti mayam ettha pāṇa atipātā paṭiviratāḥ bhavissāma ati sallekhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: ‘Pare adinnādāyī bhavissanti, mayamettha adinnādānā paṭiviratā bhavissāmā’ti sallekho karaṇīyo.
analyzed: pare adinna ādāyī bhavissanti mayam ettha adinna ādānā paṭiviratāḥ bhavissāma ati sallekhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: ‘Pare abrahmacārī bhavissanti, mayamettha brahmacārī bhavissāmā’ti sallekho karaṇīyo.
analyzed: pare abrahmacārī bhavissanti mayam ettha brahmacārī bhavissāma ati sallekhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: ‘Pare musāvādī bhavissanti, mayamettha musāvādā paṭiviratā bhavissāmā’ti sallekho karaṇīyo.

original: ‘Pare pisuṇavācā bhavissanti, mayamettha pisuṇāya vācāya paṭiviratā bhavissāmā’ti sallekho karaṇīyo.

original: ‘Pare pharusavācā bhavissanti, mayamettha pharusāya vācāya paṭiviratā bhavissāmā’ti sallekho karaṇīyo.

original: ‘Pare samphappalāpī bhavissanti, mayamettha samphappalāpā paṭiviratā bhavissāmā’ti sallekho karaṇīyo.

analyzed: pare an ottāpī bhavissanti mayam ettha ottāpī bhavissāma ati sallekhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: ‘Pare appassutā bhavissanti, mayamettha bahussutā bhavissāmā’ti sallekho karaṇīyo.
analyzed: pare appassutāḥ bhavissanti mayam ettha bahu ssutāḥ bhavissāma ati sallekhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: ‘Pare kusītā bhavissanti, mayamettha āraddhavīriyā bhavissāmā’ti sallekho karaṇīyo.
analyzed: pare kusītāḥ bhavissanti mayam ettha āraddha vīriyāḥ bhavissāma ati sallekhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: ‘Pare muṭṭhassatī bhavissanti, mayamettha upaṭṭhitassatī bhavissāmā’ti sallekho karaṇīyo.
analyzed: pare muṭṭha satī bhavissanti mayam ettha upaṭṭhita satī bhavissāma ati sallekhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: ‘Pare duppaññā bhavissanti, mayamettha paññāsampannā bhavissāmā’ti sallekho karaṇīyo.
analyzed: pare duppaññāḥ bhavissanti mayam ettha paññā sampannāḥ bhavissāma ati sallekhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: ‘Pare sandiṭṭhiparāmāsī ādhānaggāhī duppaṭinissaggī bhavissanti, mayamettha asandiṭṭhiparāmāsī anādhānaggāhī suppaṭinissaggī bhavissāmā’ti sallekho karaṇīyo.
analyzed: pare sandiṭṭhi parāmāsī ādhāna ggāhī duppaṭinissaggī bhavissanti mayam ettha a sandiṭṭhi parāmāsī an ādhāna ggāhī suppaṭinissaggī bhavissāma ati sallekhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: 2. Cittupapādapariyāya
analyzed: citta upapāda pariyāya

original: Cittuppādampi kho ahaṁ, cunda, kusalesu dhammesu bahukāraṁ vadāmi, ko pana vādo kāyena vācāya anuvidhīyanāsu.
analyzed: citta uppādam pi kho aha cunda kusalesu dhammesu bahukāram vadāmi kaḥ pana vādaḥ kāyena vācāya

original: Tasmātiha, cunda, ‘pare vihiṁsakā bhavissanti, mayamettha avihiṁsakā bhavissāmā’ti cittaṁ uppādetabbaṁ.
analyzed: tasmāt iha cunda pare vihisakāḥ bhavissanti mayam ettha a vihisakāḥ bhavissāma ati cittam uppādetabba

original: ‘Pare pāṇātipātī bhavissanti, mayamettha pāṇātipātā paṭiviratā bhavissāmā’ti cittaṁ uppādetabbaṁ …pe…
analyzed: pare pāṇa atipātī bhavissanti mayam ettha pāṇa atipātā paṭiviratāḥ bhavissāma ati cittam uppādetabbam pe

original: ‘pare sandiṭṭhiparāmāsī ādhānaggāhī duppaṭinissaggī bhavissanti, mayamettha asandiṭṭhiparāmāsī anādhānaggāhī suppaṭinissaggī bhavissāmā’ti cittaṁ uppādetabbaṁ.
analyzed: pare sandiṭṭhi parāmāsī ādhāna ggāhī duppaṭinissaggī bhavissanti mayam ettha a sandiṭṭhi parāmāsī an ādhāna ggāhī suppaṭinissaggī bhavissāma ati cittam uppādetabba

original: 3. Parikkamanapariyāya
analyzed: parikkamana pariyāya

original: Seyyathāpi, cunda, visamo maggo assa, tassa añño samo maggo parikkamanāya;
analyzed: seyyathā api cunda visamaḥ maggaḥ assa tassa añño samaḥ maggo parikkamanāya

original: seyyathā vā pana, cunda, visamaṁ titthaṁ assa, tassa aññaṁ samaṁ titthaṁ parikkamanāya;
analyzed: seyyathā vā pana cunda visamam tittham assa tassa aññam samam tittham parikkamanāya

original: evameva kho, cunda, vihiṁsakassa purisapuggalassa avihiṁsā hoti parikkamanāya, pāṇātipātissa
analyzed: evam eva kho cunda vihisakassa purisa puggalassa a vihisā hoti parikkamanāya pāṇa atipātissa

original: purisapuggalassa pāṇātipātā veramaṇī hoti parikkamanāya, adinnādāyissa purisapuggalassa
analyzed: purisa puggalassa pāṇātipātā veramaṇī hoti parikkamanāya adinna ādāyissa purisa puggalassa

original: adinnādānā veramaṇī hoti parikkamanāya, abrahmacārissa purisapuggalassa abrahmacariyā
analyzed: a dinna ādānā veramaṇī hoti parikkamanāya abrahmacārissa purisa puggalassa abrahmacariyā

original: veramaṇī hoti parikkamanāya, musāvādissa purisapuggalassa musāvādā veramaṇī hoti
analyzed: veramaṇī hoti parikkamanāya musāvādissa purisa puggalassa musāvādā veramaṇī hoti

original: parikkamanāya, pisuṇavācassa purisapuggalassa pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī hoti parikkamanāya,
analyzed: parikkamanāya pisuṇa vācassa purisa puggalassa pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī hoti parikkamanāya

original: pharusavācassa purisapuggalassa pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī hoti parikkamanāya, samphappalāpissa
analyzed: pharusa vācassa purisa puggalassa pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī hoti parikkamanāya samphappalāpissa

original: purisapuggalassa samphappalāpā veramaṇī hoti parikkamanāya, abhijjhālussa purisapuggalassa
analyzed: purisa puggalassa samphappalāpā veramaṇī hoti parikkamanāya abhijjhālussa purisa puggalassa

original: anabhijjhā hoti parikkamanāya, byāpannacittassa purisapuggalassa abyāpādo hoti parikkamanāya.
analyzed: anabhijjhā hoti parikkamanāya byāpanna cittassa purisa puggalassa a byāpādaḥ hoti parikkamanāya

original: Micchādiṭṭhissa purisapuggalassa sammādiṭṭhi hoti parikkamanāya, micchāsaṅkappassa
analyzed: micchādiṭṭhissa purisa puggalassa sammādiṭṭhi hoti parikkamanāya micchā saṅkappassa

original: purisapuggalassa sammāsaṅkappo hoti parikkamanāya, micchāvācassa purisapuggalassa
analyzed: purisa puggalassa sammāsaṅkappaḥ hoti parikkamanāya micchāvācassa purisa puggalassa

original: sammāvācā hoti parikkamanāya, micchākammantassa purisapuggalassa sammākammanto hoti
analyzed: sammā vācā hoti parikkamanāya micchā kammantassa purisa puggalassa sammā kammantaḥ hoti

original: parikkamanāya, micchāājīvassa purisapuggalassa sammāājīvo hoti parikkamanāya, micchāvāyāmassa
analyzed: parikkamanāya micchāājīvassa purisa puggalassa sammāājīvaḥ hoti parikkamanāya micchāvāyāmassa

original: purisapuggalassa sammāvāyāmo hoti parikkamanāya, micchāsatissa purisapuggalassa sammāsati
analyzed: purisa puggalassa sammāvāyāmaḥ hoti parikkamanāya micchāsatissa purisa puggalassa sammāsati

original: hoti parikkamanāya, micchāsamādhissa purisapuggalassa sammāsamādhi hoti parikkamanāya,
analyzed: hoti parikkamanāya micchāsamādhissa purisa puggalassa sammāsamādhi hoti parikkamanāya

original: micchāñāṇissa purisapuggalassa sammāñāṇaṁ hoti parikkamanāya, micchāvimuttissa purisapuggalassa
analyzed: micchāñāṇissa purisa puggalassa sammāñāṇam hoti parikkamanāya micchā vimuttissa purisa puggalassa

original: sammāvimutti hoti parikkamanāya.
analyzed: sammāvimutti hoti parikkamanāya

original: Thinamiddhapariyuṭṭhitassa purisapuggalassa vigatathinamiddhatā hoti parikkamanāya,
analyzed: thinamiddha pariyuṭṭhitassa purisa puggalassa vigata thinamiddha tā hoti parikkamanāya

original: uddhatassa purisapuggalassa anuddhaccaṁ hoti parikkamanāya, vicikicchissa purisapuggalassa
analyzed: uddhatassa purisa puggalassa anuddhaccam hoti parikkamanāya vicikicchissa purisa puggalassa

original: tiṇṇavicikicchatā hoti parikkamanāya, kodhanassa purisapuggalassa akkodho hoti parikkamanāya,
analyzed: tiṇṇa vicikiccha tā hoti parikkamanāya kodhanassa purisa puggalassa akkodhaḥ hoti parikkamanāya

original: upanāhissa purisapuggalassa anupanāho hoti parikkamanāya, makkhissa purisapuggalassa
analyzed: upanāhissa purisa puggalassa an upanāhaḥ hoti parikkamanāya makkhissa purisa puggalassa

original: amakkho hoti parikkamanāya, paḷāsissa purisapuggalassa apaḷāso hoti parikkamanāya,
analyzed: a makkhaḥ hoti parikkamanāya paḷāsissa purisa puggalassa a paḷāsaḥ hoti parikkamanāya

original: issukissa purisapuggalassa anissukitā hoti parikkamanāya, maccharissa purisapuggalassa
analyzed: issukissa purisa puggalassa a nissuki tā hoti parikkamanāya maccharissa purisa puggalassa

original: amacchariyaṁ hoti parikkamanāya, saṭhassa purisapuggalassa asāṭheyyaṁ hoti parikkamanāya,
analyzed: a macchariyam hoti parikkamanāya saṭhassa purisa puggalassa a sāṭheyyam hoti parikkamanāya

original: māyāvissa purisapuggalassa amāyā hoti parikkamanāya, thaddhassa purisapuggalassa
analyzed: māyāvissa purisa puggalassa amāyā hoti parikkamanāya thaddhassa purisa puggalassa

original: atthaddhiyaṁ hoti parikkamanāya, atimānissa purisapuggalassa anatimāno hoti parikkamanāya,
analyzed: atthaddhiyam hoti parikkamanāya atimānissa purisa puggalassa an atimānaḥ hoti parikkamanāya

original: dubbacassa purisapuggalassa sovacassatā hoti parikkamanāya, pāpamittassa purisapuggalassa
analyzed: dubbacassa purisa puggalassa sovacassatā hoti parikkamanāya pāpa mittassa purisa puggalassa

original: kalyāṇamittatā hoti parikkamanāya, pamattassa purisapuggalassa appamādo hoti parikkamanāya,
analyzed: kalyāṇa mitta tā hoti parikkamanāya pamattassa purisa puggalassa appamādaḥ hoti parikkamanāya

original: assaddhassa purisapuggalassa saddhā hoti parikkamanāya, ahirikassa purisapuggalassa
analyzed: assaddhassa purisa puggalassa saddhā hoti parikkamanāya ahirikassa purisa puggalassa

original: hirī hoti parikkamanāya, anottāpissa purisapuggalassa ottappaṁ hoti parikkamanāya,
analyzed: hirī hoti parikkamanāya anottāpissa purisa puggalassa ottappam hoti parikkamanāya

original: appassutassa purisapuggalassa bāhusaccaṁ hoti parikkamanāya, kusītassa purisapuggalassa
analyzed: appassutassa purisa puggalassa bāhusaccam hoti parikkamanāya kusītassa purisa puggalassa

original: vīriyārambho hoti parikkamanāya, muṭṭhassatissa purisapuggalassa upaṭṭhitassatitā
analyzed: vīriya ārambhaḥ hoti parikkamanāya muṭṭha ssatissa purisa puggalassa upaṭṭhita ssati tā

original: hoti parikkamanāya, duppaññassa purisapuggalassa paññāsampadā hoti parikkamanāya,
analyzed: hoti parikkamanāya duppaññassa purisa puggalassa paññā sampadā hoti parikkamanāya

original: sandiṭṭhiparāmāsiādhānaggāhiduppaṭinissaggissa purisapuggalassa asandiṭṭhiparāmāsianādhānaggāhisuppaṭinissaggitā hoti parikkamanāya.
analyzed: sandiṭṭhi parāmāsi ādhāna ggāhi duppaṭinissaggissa purisa puggalassa a sandiṭṭhi parāmāsi anādhāna ggāhi suppaṭinissaggi tā hoti parikkamanāya

original: 4. Uparibhāgapariyāya
analyzed: upari bhāga pariyāya

original: Seyyathāpi, cunda, ye keci akusalā dhammā sabbe te adhobhāgaṅgamanīyā, ye keci kusalā dhammā sabbe te uparibhāgaṅgamanīyā;
analyzed: seyyathā api cunda ye keci akusalāḥ dhammāḥ sabbe te adhobhāgaṅgamanīyāḥ ye keci kusalāḥ dhammāḥ sabbe te uparibhāgaṅgamanīyā

original: evameva kho, cunda, vihiṁsakassa purisapuggalassa avihiṁsā hoti uparibhāgāya, pāṇātipātissa purisapuggalassa pāṇātipātā veramaṇī hoti uparibhāgāya …pe…
analyzed: evam eva kho cunda vihisakassa purisa puggalassa avihisā hoti uparibhāgāya pāṇātipātissa purisa puggalassa pāṇātipātā veramaṇī hoti uparibhāgāya pe

original: sandiṭṭhiparāmāsiādhānaggāhiduppaṭinissaggissa purisapuggalassa asandiṭṭhiparāmāsianādhānaggāhisuppaṭinissaggitā hoti uparibhāgāya.
analyzed: sandiṭṭhi parāmāsi ādhāna ggāhi duppaṭinissaggissa purisa puggalassa a sandiṭṭhi parāmāsi anādhāna ggāhi suppaṭinissaggi tā hoti upari bhāgāya

original: 5. Parinibbānapariyāya
analyzed: parinibbāna pariyāya

original: So vata, cunda, attanā palipapalipanno paraṁ palipapalipannaṁ uddharissatīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: saḥ vata cunda attanā palipa palipannaḥ param palipa palipannam uddharissati iti na etat ṭhānam vijjati

original: So vata, cunda, attanā apalipapalipanno paraṁ palipapalipannaṁ uddharissatīti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: saḥ vata cunda attanā a palipa palipannaḥ param palipa palipannam uddharissati iti ṭhānam etam vijjati

original: So vata, cunda, attanā adanto avinīto aparinibbuto paraṁ damessati vinessati parinibbāpessatīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: saḥ vata cunda attanā adantaḥ a vinītaḥ a parinibbutaḥ param damessati vinessati parinibbāpessati iti na etat ṭhānam vijjati

original: So vata, cunda, attanā danto vinīto parinibbuto paraṁ damessati vinessati parinibbāpessatīti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: saḥ vata cunda attanā dantaḥ vinītaḥ parinibbutaḥ param damessati vinessati parinibbāpessati iti ṭhānam etam vijjati

original: Evameva kho, cunda, vihiṁsakassa purisapuggalassa avihiṁsā hoti parinibbānāya, pāṇātipātissa purisapuggalassa pāṇātipātā veramaṇī hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: evam eva kho cunda vihisakassa purisa puggalassa avihisā hoti parinibbānāya pāṇātipātissa purisa puggalassa pāṇātipātā veramaṇī hoti parinibbānāya

original: Adinnādāyissa purisapuggalassa adinnādānā veramaṇī hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: a dinna ādāyissa purisa puggalassa a dinna ādānā veramaṇī hoti parinibbānāya

original: Abrahmacārissa purisapuggalassa abrahmacariyā veramaṇī hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: abrahmacārissa purisa puggalassa abrahmacariyā veramaṇī hoti parinibbānāya

original: Musāvādissa purisapuggalassa musāvādā veramaṇī hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: musāvādissa purisa puggalassa musāvādā veramaṇī hoti parinibbānāya

original: Pisuṇavācassa purisapuggalassa pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: pisuṇa vācassa purisa puggalassa pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī hoti parinibbānāya

original: Pharusavācassa purisapuggalassa pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: pharusa vācassa purisa puggalassa pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī hoti parinibbānāya

original: Samphappalāpissa purisapuggalassa samphappalāpā veramaṇī hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: samphappalāpissa purisa puggalassa samphappalāpā veramaṇī hoti parinibbānāya

original: Abhijjhālussa purisapuggalassa anabhijjhā hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: abhijjhālussa purisa puggalassa anabhijjhā hoti parinibbānāya

original: Byāpannacittassa purisapuggalassa abyāpādo hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: byāpanna cittassa purisa puggalassa a byāpādaḥ hoti parinibbānāya

original: Micchādiṭṭhissa purisapuggalassa sammādiṭṭhi hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: micchādiṭṭhissa purisa puggalassa sammādiṭṭhi hoti parinibbānāya

original: Micchāsaṅkappassa purisapuggalassa sammāsaṅkappo hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: micchā saṅkappassa purisa puggalassa sammāsaṅkappaḥ hoti parinibbānāya

original: Micchāvācassa purisapuggalassa sammāvācā hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: micchā vācassa purisa puggalassa sammā vācā hoti parinibbānāya

original: Micchākammantassa purisapuggalassa sammākammanto hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: micchā kammantassa purisa puggalassa sammā kammantaḥ hoti parinibbānāya

original: Micchāājīvassa purisapuggalassa sammāājīvo hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: micchāājīvassa purisa puggalassa sammāājīvaḥ hoti parinibbānāya

original: Micchāvāyāmassa purisapuggalassa sammāvāyāmo hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: micchāvāyāmassa purisa puggalassa sammāvāyāmaḥ hoti parinibbānāya

original: Micchāsamādhissa purisapuggalassa sammāsamādhi hoti parinibbānāya.

original: Micchāñāṇissa purisapuggalassa sammāñāṇaṁ hoti parinibbānāya.

analyzed: kodhanassa purisa puggalassa akkodhaḥ hoti parinibbānāya

original: Upanāhissa purisapuggalassa anupanāho hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: upanāhissa purisa puggalassa an upanāhaḥ hoti parinibbānāya

analyzed: paḷāsissa purisa puggalassa a paḷāsaḥ hoti parinibbānāya

original: Issukissa purisapuggalassa anissukitā hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: issukissa purisa puggalassa a nissuki tā hoti parinibbānāya

original: Maccharissa purisapuggalassa amacchariyaṁ hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: maccharissa purisa puggalassa amacchariyam hoti parinibbānāya

analyzed: atimānissa purisa puggalassa an atimānaḥ hoti parinibbānāya

analyzed: dubbacassa purisa puggalassa sovacassatā hoti parinibbānāya

original: Pāpamittassa purisapuggalassa kalyāṇamittatā hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: pāpa mittassa purisa puggalassa kalyāṇa mitta tā hoti parinibbānāya

original: Pamattassa purisapuggalassa appamādo hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: pamattassa purisa puggalassa appamādaḥ hoti parinibbānāya

original: Assaddhassa purisapuggalassa saddhā hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: assaddhassa purisa puggalassa saddhā hoti parinibbānāya

original: Ahirikassa purisapuggalassa hirī hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: ahirikassa purisa puggalassa hirī hoti parinibbānāya

analyzed: anottāpissa purisa puggalassa ottappam hoti parinibbānāya

original: Appassutassa purisapuggalassa bāhusaccaṁ hoti parinibbānāya.

original: Kusītassa purisapuggalassa vīriyārambho hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: kusītassa purisa puggalassa vīriya ārambhaḥ hoti parinibbānāya

original: Muṭṭhassatissa purisapuggalassa upaṭṭhitassatitā hoti parinibbānāya.

original: Duppaññassa purisapuggalassa paññāsampadā hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: duppaññassa purisa puggalassa paññā sampadā hoti parinibbānāya

original: Sandiṭṭhiparāmāsiādhānaggāhiduppaṭinissaggissa purisapuggalassa asandiṭṭhiparāmāsianādhānaggāhisuppaṭinissaggitā hoti parinibbānāya.
analyzed: sandiṭṭhi parāmāsi ādhāna ggāhi duppaṭinissaggissa purisa puggalassa a sandiṭṭhi parāmāsi anādhāna ggāhi suppaṭinissaggi tā hoti parinibbānāya

original: Iti kho, cunda, desito mayā sallekhapariyāyo, desito cittuppādapariyāyo, desito parikkamanapariyāyo, desito uparibhāgapariyāyo, desito parinibbānapariyāyo.
analyzed: iti kho cunda desitaḥ mayā sallekha pariyāyaḥ desito cittuppāda pariyāyaḥ desito parikkamana pariyāyaḥ desitaḥ upari bhāga pariyāyaḥ desito parinibbāna pariyāyaḥ

original: Yaṁ kho, cunda, satthārā karaṇīyaṁ sāvakānaṁ hitesinā anukampakena anukampaṁ upādāya, kataṁ vo taṁ mayā.
analyzed: yam khalu cunda satthārā karaṇīyam sāvakānam hita īsinā anukampakena anukampam upādāya katam vaḥ tam mayā

original: Etāni, cunda, rukkhamūlāni, etāni suññāgārāni, jhāyatha, cunda, mā pamādattha, mā pacchāvippaṭisārino ahuvattha—ayaṁ kho amhākaṁ anusāsanī”ti.
analyzed: etāni cunda rukkha mūlāni etāni suññāgārāni jhāyatha cunda mā pamādattha mā pacchā vippaṭisārinaḥ ahuvattha ayam kho amhākam anusāsanī iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamano āyasmā mahācundo bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
analyzed: atta manaḥ āyasmā mahācundaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandi iti

original: Catuttālīsapadā vuttā,
analyzed: cattālīsa padā vuttā

original: sandhayo pañca desitā;
analyzed: sandhayaḥ pañca desitā

original: Sallekho nāma suttanto,
analyzed: sallekho nāma suttanto

original: gambhīro sāgarūpamoti.
analyzed: gambhīraḥ sāgara upamaḥ iti

original: Sallekhasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ aṭṭhamaṁ.
analyzed: sallekha suttam niṭṭhitam aṭṭhama
